item.title: Linux Desktop Is a Shit Show
item.description: Doing The Unusual â€” Criticising Linux # These are the collection of my gripes and frustrations I’m either facing right now, or have faced in the past, when using the Linux, or GNU/Linux if you will, on the desktop. I’ve been using Linux on my desktop exclusively since 2015 instead of Windows 10 or MacOS. For people out there who’re pedantic and radicalized enough to miss the point of the article, this isn’t just about the Linux kernel itself but about using Linux ecosystem on a desktop.
